normalized: it was our time; the time of the people who dwelled in the darkness.
the queen and the hunter were probably reporting yesterday's negotiations-related matter to the director in her office.
i came to the gymnasium, after delivering both the women to kitae.
of course, it was for the sake of dealing marika the finishing blow.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i appreciate your efforts for the day.
are you done with your night class?

name: marika
normalized: … what is it?
the vigilance in the assassin's voice was palpable.
she would never have displayed such emotions to someone else under normal circumstances, however, she couldn't help it now that she was already well past her limit.
the knight took a step back, the moment i appeared in front of her.
she wanted to keep her distance from me, perhaps because of her instinct.

name: yamakawa
normalized: you are leaving, aren't you?
i was thinking of throwing a small party, so how about joining in?

name: marika
normalized: fuuh… no thanks…
she let a sigh leak out of her mouth and tried to pass by me.

name: gram
normalized: you can't do what you want at all times, marika.
i activated the bug inside the grim reaper.

name: gram
normalized: we will start the party, once my subordinates arrive.

name: marika
normalized: aguh…!?
guh…!
graam…!
the knight hugged her agonized body by herself.

name: gram
normalized: kukuku… your suffering will end today.
i approached marika, while sneering at her.
when, in a flash,

name: gram
normalized: whaa… …!?
both my arms were severed.
no sooner did i realize that my arms had been sliced off than something burst out of my chest.

name: gram
normalized: gaah… …!?
i collapsed without even knowing what had happened.
my heart had been destroyed by some kind of a spear.

name: cara
normalized: you can't do what you want at all times as well, uncle.

name: gram
normalized: whaa!?
the knight was brandishing her chainsaw at me.
the queen came forth from her side.

name: cara
normalized: even though you are a member of the royal family, you sure were planning to throw a sorry excuse for a party.

name: gram
normalized: wh… why…!?
i couldn't get any response from the bug inside marika, even though i was giving it orders.
the assassin merely continued to glare at me ferociously with her serpentine eyes.

name: cara
normalized: i dispelled the curse that you had placed upon marika.

name: gram
normalized: guh…!?
does that mean…?
was the agonized behaviour that marika was displaying nothing but an act?

name: marika
normalized: how could you dare to do something like that?
i have devoted this body of mine to the queen.

name: cara
normalized: it is alright, marika.
your body should heal properly.

name: marika
normalized: even so, i won't forgive this man.

name: gram
normalized: how… did you realize…!?

name: cara
normalized: all i did was examine marika's body, since she was behaving in an unusual manner.
it wasn't difficult to find the cause of the problem, as marika and i share the special bond of servant and mistress.

name: gram
normalized: a special… bond…!?
n-no way…!
have you bastards… used the royal family's…!?

name: cara
normalized: azuma has arrested kitae, as well as your collaborator on this side.
of course, all your subordinates will be slaughtered.

name: gram
normalized: d-damn iit…!
to be thwarted yet again…!
i got up and began to drag myself towards the exit.

name: cara
normalized: marika, here is my order.
deal with gram derrick once and for all.

name: marika
normalized: yes, miss cara.
the moment i heard the rattling sound of the chainsaw, i was chopped up into minced meat.
i had been transformed into crimson-coloured chunks of meat in the blink of an eye.

name: marika
normalized: complete.

name: cara
normalized: it is unfortunate for the real yoshiki, however this time, i can't afford to leave him be.
she cast a spell of fire on me, causing my body to burn to a crisp.
i was transformed into black charcoal.

name: cara
normalized: let us hope that third time is the charm, when it comes to this guy.
i won't be leaving even a drop of his blood behind this time.

name: gram
normalized: damn… it… even… so…
everything of mine, including my lumps of meat and my blood, turned to ashes.
a few days passed, after gram's plan had been thwarted.
peace had finally returned to the school.

name: kitae
normalized: thank you.
i was freed from that man's control because of you.
kitae had returned back to being the director once again, after having escaped the fate of being gram's puppet.

name: marika
normalized: there should be others who will wish to interfere with the negotiations as well.

name: kitae
normalized: indeed.

name: azuma
normalized: well, whatever.
i'll be protecting the director from now on though.

name: cara
normalized: either way, don't be negligent.

name: kitae
normalized: i understand.
cara said so and followed after marika and azuma, as all of them headed for their classes.
kitae raised the edges of her lips into a smile, after those women had left her alone.

name: kitae
normalized: yes, indeed.
you would do well to not be negligent.
kitae caressed her belly lovingly, entirely like a woman who was carrying a piece of life in her womb.
